entry.title: Elon Musk Wants to Colonize Mars With His Tech—And Genes: Report
entry.summary: The SpaceX CEO is offering the expertise of his companies to put humans on Mars, as well as his sperm, says the New York Times.

entry.title: Telegram Game ‘Musk Empire’ Lets You Earn Crypto While Upgrading Elon
entry.summary: TELEGRAM TRYOUT: This rising tap-to-earn game lets you develop and enhance your own Elon Musk ahead of a TON token airdrop.

entry.title: UK Sells Monero Tokens 'Seized' From Convicted Drug Dealer
entry.summary: A convicted dark web drug dealer transferred his Monero holdings to UK authorities to avoid additional prison time. Now they've been sold.

entry.title: Judge ‘Surprised’ by Coinbase Subpoena Request Targeting SEC Chair Gensler—But ‘Not in a Good Way’
entry.summary: As the crypto exchange fights an SEC lawsuit, the federal regulator says Coinbase’s demands are an overreach.

entry.title: Bitcoin Won't Buckle From Mt. Gox and Germany Sales, Analysts Say
entry.summary: Will Germany's liquidations and the massive Mt. Gox repayments tank Bitcoin's price? Analysts are optimistic that BTC will hold up.

entry.title: Here Are Today's ‘Hamster Kombat’ Daily Combo and Cipher Code
entry.summary: Looking for the daily combo and cipher code for Thursday, July 11? Here’s what you need to make bank in Telegram game Hamster Kombat.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 156 - ETH ON THE RISE!
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: +$147m. ETH outperforms with ETF optimism. Germany government moves 2375 BTC again. Tether mints another $250m USDT on SOL. Trump to speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Goldman Sachs to launch 3 tokenisation projects. Realised losses similar to COVID period. Staked ETH nears ATH. CEX stablecoin volume hits 7-month low. CFTC says 70-80% of crypto not securities. Base hardfork improves compression 20-30%. BitMEX pleads guilty to AML violation. APTOS & SEI see weak attendance at ETHcc event.

entry.title: Germany Holds Less Than $300 Million in Bitcoin as Selloff Accelerates
entry.summary: Germany has sent billions of dollars' worth of Bitcoin to exchanges and market makers this week, leaving little left to sell.

entry.title: House Fails to Overturn Biden Veto on Pro-Crypto Banking Bill
entry.summary: The House vote over SEC cryptocurrency rule SAB 121 fell much the same as it did in May, despite growing political momentum around crypto.

entry.title: SEC Ends BUSD Stablecoin Investigation Without Enforcement Action, Says Paxos
entry.summary: Stablecoin issuer Paxos said Thursday that the Securities and Exchange Commission has ended an investigation into its Binance-branded product.

entry.title: MicroStrategy Reveals 10-for-1 Stock Split After Amassing $13 Billion in Bitcoin
entry.summary: Bitcoin bull Michael Saylor’s software firm will split its stock after MSTR more than tripled in price over the last year.

entry.title: ‘Do Not Visit’: DeFi Protocols Compound and Celer Hit With Wallet Drainer Attacks
entry.summary: Both the Compound and Celer sites now redirect to wallet-drainer scam pages after a DNS attack that appears to be hitting multiple projects.

entry.title: Bitcoin Rises as US Inflation Slows More Than Expected in June
entry.summary: The price of Bitcoin rose after consumer prices decreased on a monthly basis for the first time since May 2020.

entry.title: API3’s OEV Network to ‘Recapture Oracle Extractable Value’ for Lending Protocols
entry.summary: The new layer 2 platform creates new revenue streams for lending protocols through establishing an efficient market for oracle updates.

entry.title: Texas Jury Sides with Bitcoin Miner Marathon in ‘Nightmare’ Noise Dispute
entry.summary: In a surprise decision, the site manager for Marathon Digital Holdings’ Granbury mining facility was acquitted of noise violation charges.

entry.title: Bitcoin Could Boom If US Recession Worse Than Projected, Says Analyst
entry.summary: "[Bitcoin] could keep pushing after the release of the CPI and squeeze up to $1 billion of shorts under the $60,000 mark," a BRN analyst wrote.

entry.title: Electric Capital Unveils New Tool to Map Crypto's Expanding Ecosystem
entry.summary: Electric Capital said the map is a community-driven tool designed to help make more informed decisions on the industry's expansive projects.

entry.title: $11 Billion Marketplace With Ties to Cambodia's Elite Linked to Crypto Scams
entry.summary: A group with ties to Cambodia’s ruling Hun family has been accused of operating a marketplace used to facilitate crypto scams.

entry.title: Trump to Speak at Bitcoin Conference in Nashville
entry.summary: The former U.S. president will join fellow candidate Robert F. Kennedy Jr. in courting crypto voters as a rematch with Joe Biden looms.

entry.title: Marc Andreessen Sends $50K in Bitcoin to an AI Bot on Twitter
entry.summary: After asking about its goals, the tech titan provided a grant to fund them, including hardware upgrades and a token launch.

entry.title: ‘Not Like Us’: Argentina Soccer Team Clowns Drake Over Lost Bitcoin Bet
entry.summary: Drake notches a three-peat of losing Bitcoin sports wagers, while the team he bet against adds insult to injury with a Kendrick Lamar nod.

entry.title: BitMEX Dismisses Guilty Plea for Money-Laundering Violations as ‘Old News’
entry.summary: The U.S. Justice Department said the crypto exchange's policies were “toothless.”

entry.title: Biden Dropout Odds Surge as Clooney, Torres, and Pelosi Share Doubts
entry.summary: Just days ago, it appeared that Joe Biden was poised to move past calls from within his party to step aside. Not anymore.

entry.title: OpenAI Taps Lab Where the Atomic Bomb Was Built for Bioscience Study
entry.summary: Los Alamos National Laboratory will test GPT-4o in its labs to accelerate bioscience safety research.

entry.title: CFTC Chairman Says Bitcoin and Ethereum Are Commodities—Case Closed?
entry.summary: A recent federal court decision “reaffirmed” the status of the top two cryptocurrencies, but it's not a binding precedent.

entry.title: Now You Can Stash Your Bitcoin Under Your Skin
entry.summary: Seattle-based VivoKey Technologies offers subdermal crypto wallets for safe cryptocurrency transactions using NFC and RFID technology.

entry.title: Germany Has Less Than $1 Billion in Bitcoin Left to Sell
entry.summary: The German government has moved over $2 billion worth of Bitcoin to exchanges and market makers in the last week alone.

entry.title: Crypto Roundtable With Biden Advisor Leaves Industry Members 'Optimistic'
entry.summary: While some industry attendees felt the session was productive, it did little to convince anyone that the Biden Administration has changed its tune on crypto.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 155 - ETFs SAVE THE DAY
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: $216m. $654m of inflows into ETFs over 3 days. BTC transaction fees hit 4-year low. German state moves $300m BTC, holdings $1bn. SOL flips ETH for 7d DEX volumes. SOL Firedancer sees first accepted block on testnet. Tether mints another $250m USDT on SOL. Crypto monthly active addresses tops 100m. Biden crypto veto now expected to be upheld. Tech coalition urges Biden to back crypto. People face security threats at ETHCC. DBS sees 300% growth in crypto trading. PYUSD now 7th largest stable coin. China may have already sold BTC holdings. Elliptic exposes $11bn USDT scam network. StanChart in talks to buy Howard’s crypto fund. Polychain accuses former employee of side deals. SEI leads altcoins as it launches v2 mainnet beta. TIA rises 80% from lows on short squeeze. TON to release L2 based on Polygon’s tech stack.

entry.title: Jack Dorsey’s Block Sells First Bitcoin Mining Chips to Core Scientific
entry.summary: Block says this is one of the largest ASIC agreements ever signed in the history of Bitcoin mining.

entry.title: Telegram Game ‘Notcoin’ Launches Accelerator to Support TON Apps
entry.summary: Triangle is a developers community and accelerator focused on Telegram and TON, created by Notcoin in collaboration with 1inch and Sign.

entry.title: These Alts Are Outpacing the Crypto Market Rebound
entry.summary: Is alt season starting? While blue-chip crypto currencies mostly trade sideways, altcoins post impressive gains of up to 11%.

entry.title: New UK City Minister Could Signal a Shift in Crypto Policy
entry.summary: UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer has appointed Tulip Siddiq as the new City Minister, signaling a possible shift in crypto policy.

entry.title: ‘Forgotten Runiverse’ Migrating to Ethereum Network Ronin Ahead of Epic Games Launch
entry.summary: Based on the Forgotten Runes NFT collection, the online RPG will shift from Arbitrum to Ronin beginning this month.

entry.title: Uniswap Says SEC Should Drop Proposed DeFi Rules, Citing Chevron Decision
entry.summary: The DEX pointed to the Supreme Court's ruling on Chevron deference, arguing that the SEC should abandon its effort to regulate DeFi.

entry.title: Mobile Shooter Game ‘For The Win’ Will Launch on Solana
entry.summary: Crypto game studio Jungle announced that it will build the blockchain elements for first-person shooter game For The Win on Solana.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 154 - THE CELEBS ARE BACK...
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: +$295m. ETF inflows fight German selling, BTC unchanged. German government sells $900m BTC, moves more. Rate of sales implies German supply sold this week. ETH ETFs set to launch next week. Election may affect SOL ETF decision March 2025. Raydium beats ETH for 24hr fees. BTC ‘power law’ points to 300% gain by 2025. BTC in 80 day post-halving re-accumulation phase. BlackRock treasury fund hits $500m. Republicans release pro-crypto policy. Senate urges blockchain tests for national security. Drop in BTC mining difficulty ‘comparable to FTX’. MetaMask introduces delegation toolkit. 25 major projects to launch tokens in H2 2025.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 153 - A WEAK WEEKEND
entry.summary: BTC sinks 5% then bounces back to unchanged. $58-60k the main area for ‘shorts to defend’. Crypto funds saw $441m inflows last week. German government transfers 1000 BTC to sell. Crypto sentiment at lowest in over a year. ETH spot premium hits local highs. Japanese firm Metaplanet buys $2.5m BTC. Expect more miners merging: TeraWulf CEO. SOL Firedancer bug bounty goes live. GLM transfers $117m of ETH treasury to exchanges. 98% of coins have topped this cycle: Kang. ETH ETF should come in next 2 weeks: Geraci. Crypto progress disheartening: Copeland.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 152 - JOINED BY DEEZE!
entry.summary: BTC hits $54k, set for worst week in over year. Mt. Gox begins to move BTC & make distributions. German government continues to sell holdings. Worst day for BTC liquidations since FTX. Justin Sun says he is willing to buy German BTC. German MP calls on it to stop selling BTC. $52k super-trend support line eyed for BTC. Funding rates turn extremely negative across majors. Only 6 mining machines profitable below $56k. Coinbase spot buyers emerge to counter drop. Total3 hits RSI lows only hit 4 times in last 4 years. Fear & Greed index hits lowest since Jan 2023. Capo remains bullish. Real selling begins at $38k: Schiff. Coinbase continue to fight for Gensler’s emails. Circle mints $250m USDC on SOL. Symbiotic hits $1bn TVL. Taiwan Mobile may open crypto exchange. Unisat completes funding round with Binance.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 151 - BTC TAPS THE 60K LINE
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: -$14m. BTC drops to $60k, CME gap filed again. $1bn shorts liquidated if we rally to $62.6k. Pump(.)fun surpasses ETH for revenue. ETH will outperform BTC after ETF launch: K33. ETH ETF may be delayed even further. BTC heading to $150k: Fundstrat. Chainlink & Fidelity partner for fund data on-chain. USDC protects the dollar: Circle ad. Robinhood considers crypto futures in US & EU. Another BTC miner looks to IPO in US. Vitalik bullish on prediction markets. Sentient Labs raises $85m for AI on SOL. Mantra to tokenise $500m of real estate. TAO falls 15% after security breach. Crypto scams & hacks hit $572m in Q2.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 150 - BILLY TO A BILLY?
entry.summary: BTC ETF inflows hit highest in a month. ETH ETF inflows to hit $5bn in 6 months: Gemini. ETH public funds see largest outflow since 2022. SOL hits new ATH for monthly economic value. Sellers starting to look exhausted: Crypto Quant. Silvergate sued by SEC, settles for $63m. Circle gets stablecoin license for USDC in EU. US DoJ ironically chooses Coinbase for custody. Bitcoin miner aims for $16bn IPO. Bitfarms increases BTC mining amid takeover attempt. DOT has 2 year runway amid large burn. DOT ecosystem builders turn against team. PENDLE TVL falls $3bn as restaking rewards end. PayPal stablecoin goes live on Jupiter. At least $600m altcoin unlocks this month.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 149 - LUCA NETZ LIVE!
entry.summary: BTC bounces back above $61k after nosedive. SOL leads majors, BTC dominance falls. BTC RSI hit 18, largest net selling day in over a year. $174m ETF outflow led by GBTC. German government sells $24m more more BTC. Mt Gox info probably ‘leaked to insiders’. Mr 100 buys dip for first time in 34 days. SOL leads Moonpay transactions for 5th week. Trump may speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Biden rehires crypto advisor. Crypto & AI complement each other: Balaji. Bitcoin will protect AI’s wealth: Pomp. Tether stops minting on Algorand & EOS. Jupiter launches v3 swaps. ETH Foundation mailing list gets leaked. Jump CEO resigns after CFTC investigation. 54% of Japanese institutional investors want BTC. Strike launches in UK. MiCA approved EUR stablecoins coming in 6 days.

entry.title: Transhumanism and the Quest for Immortality with SingularityNET CEO Dr. Ben Goertzel
entry.summary: Transhumanism is a philosophical and intellectual movement that advocates the enhancement of the human condition using technologies that can increase longevity, cognition, and well-being. In this interview, SingularityNET founder and CEO Dr. Ben Goertzel discusses his background in the transhumanist movement and how AI, and AGI will play a part.

entry.title: Vivendi Web3 Lead: 'There's No Ethical GenAI if You Don't Protect Content'
entry.summary: Fabien Aufrechter, VP of Web 3.0 at Vivendi, joined Rug Radio's Farokh aboard the Joker Odyssey at Cannes Lions to discuss the media group's plans for a global digital copyright, and how token-gated media will lead to the end of third-party cookies.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 148 - SOL ETF NARRATIVE DOMINATES
entry.summary: SOL leads majors as Van Eck files for ETF. Bitwise hints at SOL ETF filing. SOL will get ETF, ADA & XRP won’t: GSR. SOL price may rise 8.9x with ETF: GSR. Coinbase & Stripe team up for onboarding. BTC miner sell pressure weakens. BTC activity drops to lowest level in 10 years. Steve Cohen shuts down crypto arm of hedge fund. Crypto unmentioned in Presidential debate. Kraken co-founder donates $1m to Trump. Bolivia lifts BTC ban. MegaLabs raises $20m, aims for 100k TPS.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 147 - THE BLAST FALLOUT
entry.summary: Crypto bounces, ETFs see another small net inflow. The US government sends 3940 BTC to exchanges. Spot ETH ETFs may be coming July 4th. Coinbase sues SEC over FOIA inquiries. Most ‘obvious & attractive’ buying opp possible. US man convicted of home invasions to steal BTC. Blast launches at $2.5bn FDV, disappoints many. ADA faces DDoS attacks with 200 transactions. Losses from deep fakes could hit $24bn in 2024. Miners face M&A boom on AI retrofitting. Marathon mines $16M KAS. Vitalik introduces ZK voting company Rarimo. Animoca Brands considers public listing.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 146 - IT'S BLAST DAY!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs reverse 7-day outflow. Geverman government to sell $35m more BTC. SOL Blinks allows transactions from any website. Jupiter allows you to swap tokens from X. Helius allows SOL staking from X. Drift allows you to leverage trade from X. ETH supply increases for 73 days straight. ETF review going smoothly: Gensler. Expect $15bn net inflows for ETH ETF: Bitwise. VanEck to waive ETH ETF fee until 2025. UAE new regulations could limit stablecoins. Court convicts two men for crypto ‘securities fraud’. BTC ETFs to be approved by Morgan Stanley. Vanguard CEO calls BTC ‘a stable asset like gold’. Blast launches today, 16.5% as community airdrop. $2.9bn FDV for Blast on Aevo, others predict higher. Top Blast holders to see vesting over 6 months. Nubank to integrate Bitcoin Lightning Network. FTX creditors to vote on cash or crypto repayment.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 145 - WE SURVIVED!
entry.summary: BTC bounces back above $61k after nosedive. SOL leads majors, BTC dominance falls. BTC RSI hit 18, largest net selling day in over a year. $174m ETF outflow led by GBTC. German government sells $24m more more BTC. Mt Gox info probably ‘leaked to insiders’. Mr 100 buys dip for first time in 34 days. SOL leads Moonpay transactions for 5th week. Trump may speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Biden rehires crypto advisor. Crypto & AI complement each other: Balaji. Bitcoin will protect AI’s wealth: Pomp. Tether stops minting on Algorand & EOS. Jupiter launches v3 swaps. ETH Foundation mailing list gets leaked. Jump CEO resigns after CFTC investigation. 54% of Japanese institutional investors want BTC. Strike launches in UK. MiCA approved EUR stablecoins coming in 6 days.

entry.title: Mika Shares How to Send and Receive Crypto Using Kraken Wallet
entry.summary: Join Rug Radio creator and crypto influencer Mika as she guides you through the process of sending and receiving cryptocurrency using the Kraken wallet.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 144 - A VERY RED DAY
entry.summary: BTC hits 6-week lows, $215m liquidations in fall. Mt Gox set to start BTC repayments in July. Fear & Greed index nears 2024 lows. Bitfinex whales’ long positioning rebounds. Open Interest rises as shorts grow, funding negative. BTC is economic immortality, going to $10m: Saylor. Moment of truth for BTC to rebound: Ansem. Expect $61-62k BTC to hold: Emperor BTC. SOL upgrade is big step-change: Raoul Pal. Expect slow melt-up from ETH ETF: DC Investor. MKR falls 11% as delegate gets phished. TON ecosystem sees phishing attacks spread.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 143 - CRYPTO TRENDS LOWER
entry.summary: Crypto sinks, ETFs see another $140m outflow. German government likely sells $195m more BTC. 100 day BTC break-out coming: Don Alt. SOL ETF applied for in Canada. Rumours SEC case vs Coinbase also dropped. Standard Chatered setup spot trading desk. ARB has record daily revenue on LayerZero claims. CFTC investigating Jump Crypto. FTM outperforms ahead of Sonic upgrade. Binance integrates USDT on TON. Onchain prediction market TVL continues to soar.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 142 - ETH LEADS THE RALLY
entry.summary: ETH continues to lead gains, SOL underperforms. BTC may rebound as Fed liquidity rips higher. ETH sees large amount of bullish call activity. LayerZero launches today, 25% unlock. Funding level the lowest in 3 months. German government sends 1000 BTC to exchanges. Stablecoins to become 10% of money: Circle CEO. Stabelcoin transfers up 16x in 4 years. BTC exchanges balances hit 3 year low. SOL again flips ETH for DEX volumes. Kraken reports $3m bug exploit found by CertiK. Debate about whether CertiK were whitehats. Jump Crypto gives $10m to crypto PAC. Binance launches HODLer airdrops. TipLink allows SOL transfers by email. ETHFI proposes 50% revenue for buybacks. JTO teases LSD backed stablecoin. JUP team proposes to reduce 30% of supply.

entry.title: This Robotics Company Aims to Solve a Labor Shortage in Manufacturing
entry.summary: GrayMatter Robotics Co-founder and CEO Ariyan Kabir explains the origin of the company, the need for artificial intelligence and robotics to offset a growing labor shortage, and takes Decrypt on a tour of its AI-powered facility.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 141 - SEC DROPS ETH PROBE
entry.summary: BTC: 65.4k (0%), ETH: 3545 (+3%), SOL: 139 (+2%). Top Gainers: LDO, BRETT, PEPE, AR. ETH & beta lead gains after SEC headline. SEC drops probe into ETH as a security. BTC ETFs see another $152m outflow. Pantera show $100m buying interest in ETH ETF. Pantera aims to raise new $1bn fund. Lack of staking won’t harm ETH ETF: 21 Shares. LayerZero airdrop coming June 20th. SEC concerns on USDC may delay Circle IPO. Hayes increasing PENDLE & DOGE positions. Fox News to build L2 with Polygon. EIGEN trades at $10bn pre-market. Drift & Ondo partner on RWAs. Commercial real estate coming on-chain: KPMG.
